contents.name: A Special Thanks and Art Credits

data.name: Introduction
entries: 大家好! 这本简编，"一系列的星星"，是两年多来自制和测试一套恒星和宇宙作品的成果。在你浏览以下60多页的过程中，你将探索整个D&D 5e的经过测试的、平衡的、多样化的好东西的星空。其中包括7个{@filter races|races|source=ASoS}的选项以及一个新的基础种族，野蛮人、教士、罗格和巫师的{@filter subclass|classes|source=ASoS}，24个{@filter magic items|items|source=ASoS}，26个{@filter monsters|bestiary|source=ASoS}，以及{@class Astromancer|ASoS}类。
虽然这个纲要的所有部分都很有价值，也很有趣，但前面提到的天体法师是一个特别的爱的结晶，包括一个奥秘的全施法者类底盘，6个子类，15个独特的法术，一个这是你的生活，以及24个魔法物品中的7个作为类专用物品。我们已经有了几十个独特的游戏测试者，以及数百个在战役和单人游戏中使用这个等级的人的经验，我们对我们得到的所有反应以及这个等级的最终结果感到非常兴奋。
在接下来的几十页中，所有的内容都有助于完善D&D 5e迄今为止在宇宙主题内容方面有些令人清醒的不足。虽然Tasha的作品已经帮助解决了这个问题，但我们希望这个汇编能够帮助完善这个领域的内容，让你也能使用和欣赏到它
星际旅行快乐! - 戴安娜博士

data.name: Races
entries: 许多生物在星空中找到了自己，或者受到了宇宙宏大的影响。下面的选项只是一些例子，它们从原来的种族被改变成了一个更倾向于天体的新种族，以及对星际人的描述，一个全新的种族选项。

对于这些生物，请记住，他们的原始能力分数是建议，目的是为了与种族的审美概念相一致，以及偶尔填补某些血统的原始能力分数的缺失组合。然而，在DM的允许下，用{@i Tasha's Cauldron of Everything}的可选{@variantrule Customizing your Origin|TCE|Customizing Character Options: Ability Score Increases}规则替换分数时，以下种族选项的效果同样很好，并且已经证明了平衡的发挥。

data.name: Notes on Cosmology
entries: 对于一个世界的宇宙是如何设计的，存在着无限的可能性。当然，整合本汇编中所介绍的每个或所有的创造物如何存在于这样一个世界中，是创造者DM的特权。下面将包括对某些概念的说明，比如空虚可以被理解为什么，以及如何调和现有的宇宙学思想以允许一个宇宙存在，其中本纲要的一些内容所依赖的（大部分）空虚和可穿越的空间概念可以存在。像往常一样，这些说明只是例子，DM可以重新解释（或无视！）以适应他们的特定世界。

entries.name: Considering Space
entries: 虽然这个汇编的设计意图是让创作在很大程度上不针对特定的环境，但其中的一些材料可能与管理员对其宇宙的理解不一致。人们可以决定重新调整前面几页中提出的概念，以允许这些创造，无论如何。
例如，真实空间和其他正统的龙与地下城世界倾向于使用一个包含水晶球、野外空间和活塞的系统。一个希望使用这些概念的某些方面的管理员可以得出结论，他们将保留荒野空间，但从他们的典籍中取消水晶球和活塞；使通过空间往返任何天体成为可能。

也许在你的世界里没有月亮，但有一个玩家对扮演月之学科的天体法师感兴趣。你们可以合作创造一种非常规的方式，使月球的影响仍然存在于你们的世界中。也许你可以利用星界的薄薄的星空作为你自制的可穿越空间的一个版本。你可以考虑让基于星星的创造物从这里出发，而不是传统的空间。另外，可能会出现这样的问题：在你的典籍中已经存在一个不模仿本汇编中的创造物的虚空。你可能想简单地重新命名所介绍的创造物。不要觉得被上面几页中的味道和建议所束缚!

entries.name: The Void
entries: 虚空 "是本汇编中经常提出的一个概念，被认为是空间的抽象；其领域既包括物质之间的区域，也包括已知多元宇宙之外的所有存在。在一些解释中，它是 "空 "或更抽象的 "缺乏存在"。在对这种普遍（或额外的普遍，因为它可能是）力量的其他理解中，它是一种恐怖的力量；这种力量试图让所有的东西回到物质被构想出来之前就存在的黑暗虚无。
虚空中的一些原生生物，以及虚空的总体美学，可能与远界有相似之处。然而，我们应该考虑这两个领域和原生生物所具有的不同动机。虽然远界和虚空一样，在其彻底的疯狂中让人无法理解，但在远界拥有权力的实体并不像虚空那样寻求彻底破坏创造，而是以自己的异类形象入侵并统治它。这些不同的目标意味着二者可能采取的行动不同，但DM可以决定二者的关系比本节所暗示的更密切。

entries.name: A Special Thanks
entries: 感谢在过去几年中参与测试和阅读这些作品的所有人！每个人的意见都对我们有很大的帮助。每个人的意见都有很大的帮助，特别是@TheAttackBox、@Drakitydrackity、@ChristopherTruth、@Phylea、@CalypsianCourtesan、{@link r/unearthedarcana|https://reddit.com/r/unearthedarcana}和{@i Discord of Many Things}，他们的反馈是所有这些作品重新创作的起点。
除了任何潜在的语法错误外，这些都是所有东西的最终版本（除非我们再增加1或2个东西）！但是，我们始终欢迎对游戏进行测试，因此，如果你有任何经验，请给我留言。然而，我们始终欢迎游戏测试，所以请随时给{@link u/liusediana|https://reddit.com/u/liusediana}留言，说明你可能有的任何经验。
像往常一样，祝您星际旅行愉快

fluff.name: Astromancer
entries: 一位年长的半兽人妇女坐在她那吱吱作响的小屋里，眼睛因为思考各种星图和占卜骨而慢慢变得无力，她相信自己已经接近通过解释天空来决定她的部落的命运。她小心翼翼地卷起一个看起来很古老的卷轴，叹了口气，凝视着墙壁，又看到了一打地图和一套龙骨，必须在早上之前检查出完整的读数。
两个半身人静静地站在一个盆子的两边念咒，满月在里面的祭祀水面上反射出明亮的光芒。光线随着他们的咒语而增长，溢出池外，使该地区充斥着月光的光芒。这些人转向天空，他们开始慢慢地从土地上升起，重力使他们摆脱了土地的控制。
一个长发的精灵，终于可以在前线自由地切割他们的敌人，开始高兴地唱歌，而火热的风在他们的身体周围呼啸。光明似乎被他们所吸引，为他们鼓舞人心的存在提供了额外的光亮，并沿着他们的刀身标记出辉煌的太阳符号。

entries.name: Wielding the Cosmos
entries: 天体术士被那些甚至决定命运本身的宏大宇宙力量所吸引，他们挥舞着天体的力量来击溃他们的敌人，并解开巨大的黑暗世界中的秘密。利用恒星和其他宇宙实体发出的巨大能量，天体术士获得了强大的奥术魔法。这些睿智的贤者能够编织月光和星光，以阻碍他们的敌人，支持同伴，并操纵战场。
占星术是一门优雅而广阔的艺术，但也很难。揭示宇宙的运作和弥合奥术与神性之间的距离所带来的力量是一种诱惑；这对寻求灵感或原始力量的最灵活的信徒来说特别有吸引力。
适应性和敏锐性是真正高超的占星师的标志。每一门学科，无论是专注于月亮、星星、太阳，还是其他方面，都有利于那些有能力评估情况并最大限度地利用其能力采取果断行动的人。

entries.name: The Grand Design
entries: 那些专攻占星术的人在直觉上理解不同的宇宙体和模式如何协同工作以创造或显示命运的变化方面有很大的技巧。占星师，比大多数奥术施法者更倾向于从事信仰和灵性的工作。这往往是由于他们对这些模式的来源以及命运对他们的艺术有多么核心的质疑。
我们不难发现，占星师将命运之神纳入他们的崇拜之中，他们认识到神明所倾向的命运设计与不断变化的星座和行星的组织是一体的。有些人甚至把某些神灵看作是最伟大的星相术实践者，并为启示祈祷。

entries.name: Creating an Astromancer
entries: 当你创造你的星象师时，要考虑的一个最重要的方面是你如何获得你的力量。你是否被天体的幻象拜访过，暗示你有一条更伟大的道路要走？你是否有一个导师教给你他们的手艺或理解宇宙力学的自然技能？你过去的各种经历可能使你能够利用宇宙体发出的能量，了解这段历史将有助于决定你的潜在学科。
你还必须考虑你打算用你持有的权力做什么。你是否有一个具体的目标，或者你只是试图探索世界以收集知识和智慧？你是打算用太阳的愤怒来保护你的祖国，还是希望揭示世界固有的秘密，进一步了解未知的地方？

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: 按照这些建议，你可以迅速成为一名天体法师。首先，智慧应该是你最高的能力得分，其次是体质或灵巧。第二，选择（%0%）或（%1%）的背景。

fluff.name: This is Your Life
entries: 为了帮助你创建你的天体法师，你可以使用以下表格中的建议来帮助你决定你的角色的背景故事和目标。

entries.name: Call of Power
entries: 大多数天体物理学家都经历过某种事件，或者来自于一个长期的从业传统，导致他们采用他们的手艺和能力来挖掘宇宙能量。这些召唤可能很明显，在这些强大的施法者的生命历程中，有大有小的影响。

entries.caption: Call of Power
rows: 你从一个星际生物那里得到了光辉的愿景。
你曾计划成为一名牧师，但发现他们的崇拜对你的崇高梦想来说太有局限性。
你从小就被绑架，被迫加入一个秘密的教派，该教派赋予你奥秘的力量。
你的家人是一脉相承的占星师，对你的期望很高。
你偶然发现了属于一位大师的塔，他收留了你并向你展示了宇宙模式。
你在理解宇宙力学的宏大方面一直有一套诀窍。

entries.name: Bond to the Beyond
entries: 大多数人通过他们的生活经验来理解世界，并需要证明来为他们的观点增加新的信息。天文学与这种期望相冲突，它是一套专门关注发生在世界视野之外的事物的学科。
考虑一下你可能与你的力量有什么关系。这是你后来才相信的东西吗？你是否从小就对光和星星有一种迷恋？也许你渴望在任何地方都能找到力量？

entries.caption: Bond to The Beyond
rows: 你不确定你与这个魔法的关系，希望随着你的发展了解更多。
你一生都感到被这种魔力所困扰。
光明和黑暗一直让你着迷。
你很难理解许多事情，除了你周围宇宙的复杂运作。
用宇宙的力量保护天体的设计是你最宝贵的职责。
你品味你的力量，无论其来源如何。

entries.name: Inspiration for Adventure
entries: 你为什么要冒险离开你的隐居地或观察站？你是否相信，一场巨大的灾难可能很快降临到这个世界，而你有阻止它的远见？也许你已经被封存起来，需要探索一个简单的学习所不能给予的观点。
获得对宇宙的全面了解几乎是一种徒劳的努力，但从世界各地和飞机上收集经验可能被证明是实现这一目标的最富有成效的努力。想一想是什么促使你踏上目前的冒险之旅，以及这可能会影响你的观点。

entries.caption: Inspiration for Adventure
rows: 来自宇宙的低语引诱你去寻找危险。
一位夜空中的神灵给了你一个神圣的任务。
你的目的是制定你自己对世界秩序的看法。
你对星星的解读表明，一个巨大的变化将很快降临到这个世界。
你有一种强烈的愿望，要屠杀你的敌人。
你渴望着只有在探索中才能实现的愿景。

classFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: 你已经学会了理解和控制塑造世界和编织命运之线的巨大力量。你的使命是寻找并看到隐藏在宇宙模式中的更大真理。关于法术的一般规则，请参见法术规则，以及可用的选择的（%0%）。

entries.name: Cantrips
entries: 你知道三个自选的咒语（%0%）。你在更高的等级中学习额外的天体法师咒语，如天体法师表中已知的咒语栏所示。

entries.name: Spell Slots
entries: 天体法师表显示了你有多少个法术槽来施展你的一级及以上的天体法师法术。要施展其中一个法术，你必须消耗一个该法术等级或更高的法术槽。当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会重新获得所有消耗的法术槽。
例如，如果你知道一级法术（%0%），并且有一个一级和一个二级法术槽可用，你可以使用任何一个槽来施放（%1%）。

entries.name: Spells Known of 1st-Level and Higher
entries: 你会从（%0%）中选择四个一级法术。
天体法师表中的 "已知法术 "一栏显示了你何时学习更多你选择的天体法师法术。每个法术都必须达到你有法术槽的等级，如表中所示。例如，当你在这个等级达到3级时，你可以学习一个1级或2级的新法术。
此外，当你完成一个长时间的休息或你在这个等级中的等级，你可以从你所知道的天体法师法术中选择一个，并用天体法师法术列表中的另一个法术代替它，该法术也必须是你有法术槽的等级。

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: 智慧是你的天体法师法术的施法能力。你的魔法来自于你周围宇宙的巨大潜在能量，你理解其性质的潜力，以及你将你的意志与这些力量联系起来的能力。每当法术提到你的法术能力时，你就会使用你的智慧。此外，在设定你所施展的天体法师法术的蓄力DC时，以及在用天体法师法术进行攻击卷时，你都会使用你的智慧修饰。

entries.name: Ritual Casting
entries: 你可以把你知道的任何天体法师的咒语作为一种仪式来施放，如果该咒语有仪式标签的话。

entries.name: Spellcasting Focus
entries: 你可以为你的天体法师法术使用一个（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Starmote
entries: 一级时，你对天堂的理解和联系使你获得了天堂的一小部分壮丽。作为一个行动，你可以为你周围60英尺内的一个生物创造一个星芒，在30英尺的范围内发出昏暗的光。星芒和这道光只对该生物可见。
星芒总是以该生物为中心，并持续到你以行动的方式解除它。该生物也可以使用它的额外行动来消耗他们的星芒，使他们在1分钟内对一个目标的下一次成功攻击使其沐浴在恒星的光芒中。他们的目标在5英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外10英尺范围内发出暗光，直到他们下一个回合结束。
你在同一时间只能在一个生物身上激活一个星动器。然而，你可以在以后的等级中为多个目标召唤额外的星动仪，如天体法师表中的活跃星动仪栏所示。如果你召唤的星动仪超过了你的上限，你可以选择用哪个当前激活的星动仪来替代。
这个特征所创造的光亮区域是有魔力的，但是其他有魔力的光亮或黑暗效果，例如{@spell light}或{@spell darkness}的法术效果，如果与这些区域重叠，只要它们还在，就会优先于这个特征。

classFeature.name: Cosmic Discipline
entries: 当你达到第二级时，你会致力于天文学中的一个特定学科，每个学科都专注于不同类型的天体和传统。你可以选择地平线修炼、月亮修炼、星星修炼、太阳修炼、虚空修炼和世界修炼，每项修炼都在等级描述的末尾有详细说明。
你的选择在2级时授予你特性，在6级、10级和14级时再次授予你特性。

classFeature.name: Cosmic Discipline Feature
entries: 在6级时，你获得一个由你的宇宙修炼所赋予的特性。

classFeature.name: Cosmic Discipline Feature
entries: 在10级时，你获得一个由你的宇宙修炼所赋予的特性。

classFeature.name: Cosmic Discipline Feature
entries: 在14级时，你获得一个由你的宇宙修炼所赋予的功能。

classFeature.name: Speed of Light (5 ft.)
entries: 从3级开始，你操纵星光的技能允许你为你的盟友的行动注入小的好处。你的Starmote特性现在可以使目前拥有它的生物的速度提高5英尺。在这个等级中，7级时增加到10英尺，17级时增加到15英尺。

classFeature.name: Speed of Light (10 ft.)
entries: 你的Starmote功能现在可以使目前拥有它的生物的速度提高10英尺。

classFeature.name: Speed of Light (15 ft.)
entries: 你的Starmote功能现在可以使目前拥有它的生物的速度提高15英尺。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到四级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用特技，你可以改用{@5etools feat|feats.html}。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到8级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用特技，你可以改用{@5etools feat|feats.html}。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到12级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用特技，你可以改用{@5etools feat|feats.html}。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到16级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用特技，你可以改用{@5etools feat|feats.html}。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到19级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用特技，你可以改用{@5etools feat|feats.html}。

classFeature.name: Star-Touched
entries: 当你达到10级时，你能引导的宇宙能量已经增加到如此之多，以至于你现在给你的星象仪赋予了更大的效用。当你施展一个范围为触摸的法术时，你的一个星动器以你周围60英尺内的生物为中心，就像你在它的空间里一样，可以传递法术。

classFeature.name: Release Gravity
entries: 在18级时，你终于对物质与宇宙中所有其他物体和力量的引力关系有了亲和力。你可以用你的行动给你周围120英尺范围内的每个拥有你的Starmotes的生物提供30英尺的飞行速度，最多持续10分钟，或者你把它作为一个行动解除。当这个飞行结束时，你用这个特征影响的生物会获得（%0%）的法术效果。
一旦你使用这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成长时间的休息。

classFeature.name: Zenith
entries: 在20级时，你已经达到了你的宇宙掌握的巅峰，允许你熟练地控制你的星矢和法术。你的星动功能获得以下效果。

items: 你可以看到你创造的任何星际导弹的暗淡光线。
当你为保持对一个法术的注意力而进行宪法规定的投掷时，你可以消耗一个当前正在使用的星动器来自动成功地进行投掷。
你可以用你的行动来召唤相当于你最大数量的活跃星象的星象，如天体法师表中所示。一旦你使用了这个功能，你就不能再以这种方式使用它，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Discipline of Horizons
entries: 这是一个观察和遵守命运设计的传统，那些受此约束的人试图确保没有生物能成功地摆脱命运的枷锁。这些追随者可能走向世界，寻求抚慰一个群体走向死亡的自然进程，或者强行阻止宿命计划中的反常现象。
这个教派的追随者相信宇宙的必然性，把他们周围的黎明和黄昏的永恒兴衰作为灵感。这些人利用宇宙的这一最基本的模式，伤害和守护着这一不变的设计。

subclassFeature.name: Transitional Vigil
entries: 在2级时，你对黄昏循环的坚定观察赋予你在脱离战斗时的严格专注。你在有意识的情况下不能再被惊讶。

subclassFeature.name: Daybreak
entries: 同样在2级，当拥有你的一个星芒的生物以额外行动消耗它时，他们在1分钟内对一个目标的下一次成功攻击中会造成额外的（%0%）辐射伤害。消耗星芒的生物也会获得相当于额外辐射伤害量的临时命中率，持续时间最长为1分钟。
在这个等级中，额外的伤害量在6级时增加到（%0%），10级时增加到（%1%），14级时增加到（%2%）。

entries.name: Rule Tip: Temporary Hit Points
entries: 当你在已经拥有临时命中率的情况下收到临时命中率时，你可以在这两个量中选择。{@i Player's Handbook: pg. 198}

subclassFeature.name: Temper of Twilight
entries: 在6级时，你对命运之路的坚持使你能够抵制那些与之对抗的人。你在对被（%0%）或（%1%）的救赎上有优势。
你也可以用你的行动对你周围60英尺内你能看到的生物消耗一个有效的星动仪，以结束一个导致他们被（%0%）或（%1%）的效果。

subclassFeature.name: Penumbral Shift
entries: 在10级时，你对黎明和黄昏的必然性和相互关联性的专业知识使你对你的星象有了更大的洞察力。每当你完成一次长时间的休息，你就为你的星矢选择下列选项之一。

items.name: Dawn Mote:
entries: 你的星矢特征发出的亮光被认为是阳光。此外，当在你120英尺范围内拥有你的一个星象仪的盟友被降低到0命中率，但没有被直接杀死时，你可以使用你的反应让该生物降低到1命中率。一旦你使用这个特性，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。

items.name: Dusk Mote:
entries: 你可以使用你的额外行动来选择一个你能看到的60英尺范围内的生物，该生物拥有你的一个星动体。目标和他们所穿戴或携带的任何东西都会变得（%0%），直到他们的下一个回合结束，因为阴森的黑暗包裹着他们的身体。一旦你使用这个特性，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。
当你使用一个由你的五芒星移位功能赋予你的效果时，你的星矢会立即转换为其相反的五芒星移位形态，直到你完成一个长时间的休息，允许你使用该形态的效果。

subclassFeature.name: Predestination
entries: 在这个等级的14级时，你会谴责你的敌人去迎接他们即将到来的最终命运。每当一个生物用你的破晓特性对目标造成伤害时，受到伤害的生物在下一回合结束前不能恢复命中率。

subclassFeature.name: Discipline of Moons
entries: 属于 "月亮学科 "的学徒和信徒们的动机通常都很多样。这一传统的许多学生寻求利用一个世界的单个或多个月亮所拥有的巨大引力和超自然的力量来达到自己的目的。有些人希望了解月球周期，辨别它们对注定的未来的影响。另一些人只是寻求在他们的视野中快乐地崇敬纯洁的无污染的光。
无论灵感如何，真正精通这门学科是很难达到的。那些试图掌握月球和它们所召唤的光的人需要有强烈的意志和精神敏锐度，以免这些月亮的请愿者发现他们的理智在他们所崇尚的强大视力下滑落。

subclassFeature.name: Lunar Attunement
entries: 从第2级开始，你可以从以下咒语中选择一个学习：（%0%）、（%1%）或（%2%）。
你的选择对你来说算作一个天体法师的咒语，但它不计入你已知的咒语数量。

subclassFeature.name: Wax and Wane
entries: 同样在2级的时候，当你选择这门学科时，你学会了巧妙地影响你周围的光线。使用你的额外行动，你可以在一个半径为10英尺的球体中施加昏暗的光线，这个球体的中心是你60英尺内选择的一个点。该球体在1分钟后消失，或者你以行动的方式将其解除。
每当你创造这种环境月光的效果时，你也要从下列选项中选择一个该区域在其持续时间内体现的阶段。

items.name: New Moon:
entries: 这个区域的阴暗和引力会抓住那些试图通过它的人，使每个在这个区域开始行动的生物的速度降低10英尺，直到他们的回合结束。

items.name: Quarter Moon:
entries: 拥有你的一个星象仪的生物会在它的蓄力动作上增加{@dice 1d4}，并且它们的攻击会被算作魔法，以便在该区域内克服对非魔法攻击和伤害的抵抗和免疫。

items.name: Full Moon:
entries: 这个阶段的照明使目标10英尺半径范围内的昏暗光线变成明亮的光线，以及进一步洒下10英尺半径范围内的昏暗光线。
这个功能所产生的多个效果可以重叠在一起。在与你的Starmote功能相同的条件下，这个功能所产生的光被认为是神奇的，但只要你的Starmote的亮光效果还在，它就优先于这个效果。如果有任何效果遮蔽了这个特征的光，这个特征的其他效果仍然保留在这个区域。
你可以使用这个功能的次数与你的智慧修饰值相等（最少一次）。当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会重新获得任何已消耗的使用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Fierce Light
entries: 在6级时，你可以引导苍白而不屈的月光来阻碍和揭示。你的Starmote特性所发出的昏暗光线现在对你来说延伸到120英尺，对其他生物来说延伸到60英尺。你的Starmote功能所发出的亮光也能使变形者恢复到原来的形态，并在持续时间内阻止它变成另一种形态。

subclassFeature.name: Phase Lock
entries: 达到10级后，你对相位的研究使你能更有效地操纵月球技能。作为一个行动，你可以选择耀斑一个由你的 "蜡像 "功能所创造的球体，结束它当前的效果，但根据该区域的相位，颁布以下结果之一。

items.name: New Moon:
entries: 在该区域内的每个生物，如果没有拥有你的星象仪，就必须对你的天体法师咒语的救赎值做一个灵巧的投掷，否则就会被球体的张力进一步减慢，使它们的速度降到0。在它的每个回合结束时，生物会做一个灵巧的投掷来逃避这个效果。一旦成功，这个效果就会对该生物结束。

items.name: Quarter Moon:
entries: 你将你看到的一个自愿的生物从它在这个球体内的空间传送到你能看到的腊肠区域内任何一个无人的空间，包括这个消逝的腊肠效果内的空间。

items.name: Full Moon:
entries: 在球体的亮光或暗光中拥有你的一个星体的生物，会立即获得相当于你的天体法师等级一半的临时命中率。

subclassFeature.name: Invoke Eclipse
entries: 在这个等级的第14层，你可以使自己与即将发生的日蚀保持一致，呈现出一种天文学的力量。每长时休息一次，使用你的行动，你可以进行一次转变，获得以下好处，持续1分钟。

items: 你获得对法术伤害的抵抗力。
在你30英尺范围内依靠视觉的敌人对你的攻击卷轴是不利的。
你获得了（%0%）的法术，如果你还没有这个法术的话，并且可以使用你的奖励动作施放一次，而不需要消耗一个法术槽。当使用此特征的奖励动作施放时，该法术的效果也可以使用奖励动作来移动。

subclassFeature.name: Discipline of Stars
entries: 利用恒星模式的原始魔法已被发现可以追溯到最早的接触神灵和占卜未来的尝试。这种古老的窥视星象的传统随着时间的推移不断发展，数千年来的星图和天体事件被记录和研究。
这门学科的追随者往往是那些旨在了解命运的模式或通过神秘手段收集有关神灵设计的知识的人。少数有能力完成这些壮举的人得到了星星的力量的奖励；通过操纵他们的星象和法术，使命运的天平向他们倾斜的工具。

subclassFeature.name: Cosmic Storytelling
entries: 在2级时，你可以熟练掌握以下技能中的一种。{@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Religion}, 或 {@skill Survival}。

subclassFeature.name: Star Reader
entries: 同样在2级的时候，你对即将发生的事件有轻微的洞察力，并能改变局势以改善你的团体的命运。当敌人在你周围60英尺内以优势攻击拥有你的一个星动器的生物时，你可以用你的反应来阻止其从优势中获益。你也可以在这个反应中消耗该生物身上的星动器，使他们在下一次攻击中获得优势，直到他们下一个回合结束。
你可以使用这个功能的次数与你的智慧修饰值相等（最少一次）。当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会重新获得任何已消耗的使用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Stellar Embodiment
entries: 从6级开始，你对星星的研究使你能够进一步挖掘世界之外的潜在能量。每当你完成一次长时休息，你可以选择以下两个选项并获得它们的效果。每当你完成一次长时休息，你就会失去你目前拥有的任何选项的效果。

items.name: The Tree:
entries: 你获得相当于你的天体法师等级一半的临时命中率，以及对第一次成功攻击你的伤害的抵抗。

items.name: The Lantern:
entries: 你获得了（%0%）的咒语，如果你还没有的话，并且可以在30英尺的范围内施放它。你在主动性检查上也有优势。

items.name: The Hand:
entries: 你选择你的一个技能熟练度。在你做的任何能力检查中，你的熟练度加成都会翻倍，并使用该熟练度。

items.name: The Lovers:
entries: 你可以在1级时使用你的天体法师法术救赎DC施展一次（%0%），不需要任何语言或体质成分，也不需要消耗一个法术槽。在救赎失败后，目标不会意识到魅力的存在。你在本类的第14级时，在第2级时用此特征施放（1%）。

items.name: The Scales:
entries: 你可以在1级时使用你的天体法师法术救赎DC施放{@spell bane}或{@spell bless}一次，并且不需要消耗一个法术槽。你在第2级时可以用这个特性施放（2%）或（3%），当你在这个等级中达到14级时。

items.name: The Maw of Stars:
entries: 你可以在1级时使用你的天体法师法术救赎DC施展一次（%0%），并且不需要消耗一个法术槽。该法术的目标必须在其下一回合开始时使用其反应以及一半的速度，以便在救赎失败后远离你。你在本阶级14级时，在2级时用此功能施放（%1%）。

subclassFeature.name: Diviner's Boon
entries: 从10级开始，当你使用你的读星者特性来阻止一个攻击卷从优势中受益时，你也会阻止该特性的目标在任何攻击卷中从优势中受益，直到他们的回合结束。
此外，当你使用你的读星器功能消耗一个星矢并使目标在他们的下一次攻击卷中获得优势时，目标也会在他们的下一次投掷中获得优势，直到他们的下一个回合结束。

subclassFeature.name: Stellar Mastery
entries: 在14级时，你已经扩展了你在宇宙运作方面的知识，以至于你已经学会了获取更复杂的宇宙关系的力量。你现在可以为你的恒星化身功能选择三种效果，并可以从以下选项中为这个功能选择。

items.name: Alignment:
entries: 你可以从{@spell commune}、{@spell dream}、{@spell legend lore}、{@spell scrying}、{@spell telepathic bond}或{@spell teleportation circle}中选择一个来学习，并可以使用一个天体法师的法术槽来施展你的选择。从这个功能中学到的法术不计入你的已知法术数量，并且可以在不使用组件的情况下施放。

items.name: Conjunction/Opposition:
entries: 一次，作为额外行动，你可以指定两个你能看到的在你60英尺范围内的生物，迫使它们对你的天体法师法术救赎DC进行力量救赎，或者各自在一条直线上向对方移动最多30英尺或离开对方。如果这个能力的目标击中了一个坚固的物体或生物，目标每移动5英尺就会受到1d6的重击伤害。如果击中一个生物，另一个生物必须对你的天体法师法术救赎DC成功地进行灵巧救赎，失败时受到相同数量的伤害，成功时受到一半的伤害。体型高于大型的生物在对该效果的初始蓄力上有优势。

subclassFeature.name: Discipline of the Sun
entries: 与其专注于命运的设计或对月亮的一贯痴迷，那些太阳学派的人倾向于将他们的注意力放在他们所挥舞的宇宙力量的更实际的应用上。作为一门骄傲而精致的火热武术学科，这些天体术士从太阳表面发生的根本性的强大事件，以及每天的太阳潮和风中穿过世界，分散和打击他们的敌人。

subclassFeature.name: Firebrand
entries: 从2级开始，你与太阳凶猛力量的先天联系开始为你的战斗能力提供动力。

items: 当你拥有你的一个Starmotes时，你会获得一个热的屏障，可以反击不必要的攻击并加强你自己的挥舞。当你没有穿戴盔甲时，这些太阳风会改变你的AC等于13+你的灵巧修饰，并且你获得对（%0%）和（%1%）的熟练度。
如果你精通简单或武术的近战武器，你可以用它作为天体法师法术的施法重点。

entries: 当你用具有精巧属性的武器进行近战武器攻击对一个生物造成伤害时，你可以选择在敌人身上打上一个太阳烙印，时间长达1分钟。如果被烙印的生物在施加伤害后受到火焰或辐射伤害，这个烙印将会爆发，造成额外的（%0%）火焰伤害。一旦烙印造成伤害，它就会被消耗掉并消失。
每次攻击只能使用一个烙印，但一个生物一次最多可以有两个烙印在他们身上。当你达到这个等级的第14级时，烙印的伤害就会提高，增加到2d6的火焰伤害。
你可以使用这个功能的次数与你的智慧修饰值相等（最少一次）。当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会重新获得所有已消耗的使用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: 达到6级后，在你的回合中采取{@action Attack}行动时，你可以攻击两次，而不是一次。

subclassFeature.name: Radiance
entries: 同样在6级时，当你完成短暂的休息时，你会重新获得你的火刃特征的使用权。

subclassFeature.name: Mirage
entries: 在10级时，你对发光的掌握使你可以用编织的光线来分散敌人的注意力。当你能看到的30英尺范围内的生物对你进行攻击时，你可以用你的反应立即变得（%0%），在你的空间里创造一个你自己的虚幻复制品，并以你一半的速度移动。这个复制品和隐身状态持续到你的下一个回合结束，但如果你攻击或施法，隐身状态就会结束。
如果你在复制体在场时采取{@action Attack}行动，你可以从你自己或复制体的位置进行攻击。你的复制品使用你的命中和伤害加成，它造成的任何伤害都被视为辐射伤害，而且它的攻击能够应用你的火刃标记。
一旦你使用这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Solar Flare
entries: 在14级的时候，当你用你的火种特征标记一个生物时，你可以强迫目标对你的天体法师的蓄力DC进行宪法蓄力，否则就会被{@condition blinded}，直到他们下一个回合结束。在这种情况下，生物无法进行机会攻击。
你目前必须拥有你的一个星象仪才会发生这个效果。对该效果进行救治的生物不会受到{@condition blinded}，并且在24小时内对该效果免疫。

subclassFeature.name: Discipline of the Void
entries: 这种传统的大师很少能被发现。外人不清楚这是否是由于他们的痴迷与世隔绝而导致的隐居，还是由于他们必须为自己的力量而忍受严格的考验。
然而，这些人是少数，他们认识到真正的辉煌不是在星星之间，而是在包含它们的真空中；发现万物之间的空间不是真正的空虚，而是有其自身的本质，应该加以利用和敬畏。

subclassFeature.name: Distant Whispers
entries: 在2级时，你可以凭直觉学习一种你选择的异国语言。在这个等级的第10级时，你可以学习你选择的第二种异国语言。

entries.name: Languages Near and Far
entries: 每个环境都有自己独特的语言，这些语言可能存在，而且可以供玩家使用。与你的管理员合作，决定什么才是你可以选择的异国语言。通常可用的语言列表可以在这里找到。{@book Player's Handbook: pg. 123|PHB|4|Languages}

subclassFeature.name: Empty Space
entries: 同样在2级时，作为在你的回合中用于施法的行动或额外行动的一部分，你可以瞬间传送到一个你能看到的目前无人的空间，最多可以传送10英尺。当使用这个功能时，你可以消耗一个你选择的当前激活的星动器来传送到20英尺以外，而不是。
你可以使用这个功能的次数与你的智慧修饰值相等（最少一次）。当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会重新获得所有已消耗的使用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Dark Expansion
entries: 从6级开始，你可以在使用1级或2级法术槽施法时使用此功能，并获得使用高一级法术槽施法的好处。
例如，如果你在二级施放（%0%）法术时使用这个特征，你最多可以惊吓三个目标，而不是两个，正如高一级施放的（%1%）法术效果中详细说明的那样。
当你在这个等级中达到7级时，你可以用这个特征影响的最高等级的法术槽增加到3级，当你在这个等级中达到9级时增加到4级。
一旦你使用了这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Response From Beyond
entries: 从10级开始，你对星空的呼唤使你获得了短暂的守护者，他们被带到这个世界来服从你的意志。使用你的额外行动，你可以在与你相邻的无人空间中召唤两个（%0%），使用《怪物手册》中（%1%）的统计数据。
这些生物在他们的攻击卷上获得相当于你的智慧修改器的奖励（最低+1）。此外，这些实体不会用它们的攻击减少目标的力量，只理解你发出的命令，并被视为反常，而不是亡灵。
当来自超越的阴影被召唤出来时，它们可以被发出命令，并且必须将命令作为后续的奖励行动来移动或攻击。这些生物将为你服务10分钟，直到它们死亡，你作为奖励行动遣散实体，或者你变成（%0%），之后它们就会消失。
一旦你使用这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Encroaching Night
entries: 在达到14级时，你可以行使你对空无一物的空间日益增长的控制力，以增强你的阴暗操纵。每当你用你的 "空无 "功能消耗一个 "星辰 "时，你现在可以传送到一个你能看到的无人空间，或者在120英尺内与你的一个 "阴影 "交换位置。
如果你在使用空虚空间功能时召唤了你的超越之影，每个人都可以在你传送之前或之后作为反应对他们近战攻击范围内的目标进行攻击（由你选择），增加相当于你的智慧修正值的坏死伤害（最低+1），同时获得相当于他们所受伤害的临时命中率。

subclassFeature.name: Discipline of the World
entries: 虽然占星师们把大部分精力放在世界之外的天体上，但也有人认识到，地球本身也是伟大设计的一部分。有些人还发现，这个世界迫切需要保护，以抵御超越这个平面的力量和试图伤害它的苍白。利用宇宙的知识来抵御这些攻击者，这门学科中的人为了所有人的利益，寻求保护他们所居住的土地。

subclassFeature.name: Guardian of the Material
entries: 2级时，你获得对（%0%）的熟练度，并可以使用盾牌作为你的天体法师法术的施法重点。

subclassFeature.name: Star Shield
entries: 同样在2级时，你可以利用世界的基础和超越世界的宇宙力量之间的联系，使用你的Starmote功能来获得更大的保护。
作为一个额外的行动，你可以在60英尺范围内消耗一个活跃的星象仪，并使你自己和拥有它的目标的AC值增加，增加的量等于你活跃的星象仪的最大数量，如天体法师表所示，直到你下一回合开始。
你可以使用这个功能的次数与你的智慧修饰值相等（最少一次）。当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会重新获得所有已消耗的使用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Planar Protector
entries: 从6级开始，你可以通过在接触任何异形、天人、妖怪或魔物时感应到它们是什么类型的生物而意识到它们的真实性质。
此外，当任何这些类型的生物对你或目前受你的Starmote特性影响的盟友造成伤害，并且你能看到你周围60英尺范围内，你可以使用你的反应来减少他们受到的伤害（%0%）。这个伤害减免在10级时增加到（%1%），在14级时增加到（%2%）。

subclassFeature.name: Land Warden
entries: 达到10级后，土地本身已经认可了你的保护努力。你学会了（%0%）的法术，如果你还不知道的话，并且可以在不消耗法术槽的情况下施放一次。这个法术不计入你已知的法术数量。
一旦你以这种方式施展石墙，你就不能再这样做了，直到你完成一个长时间的休息，尽管你仍然可以用一个可用的法术槽正常施展它。

subclassFeature.name: Dustmote
entries: 从14级开始，当你用你的星盾功能对一个目标消耗一个Starmote时，你可以选择让你的目标获得一个挥之不去的凝聚的星尘，时间长达1小时。当生物拥有这个尘埃时，他们对你选择的一种伤害类型有抵抗力，而不是你在创造尘埃时选择的击打、穿刺或砍击伤害，因为闪烁的粒子可以抵御伤害。
一个拥有尘埃的生物也可以选择把它作为一个行动来使用，使它的星尘迸发出来，并迫使以该生物为中心的10英尺半径范围内的所有其他生物对你的天体法师法术救赎DC做一个宪法救赎。如果救赎失败，生物会在1分钟内受到（%0%）的伤害。在它的每个回合结束时，受影响的生物可以做一次宪法救赎。如果成功，效果结束。
一旦你使用了这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Path of the Moon-Touched
entries: 虽然可能不像狼人那样因被月球力量改变而闻名，但被月球触及的人是凶猛的狂暴者，他们的思想在不屈的、但苍白而迷人的月光下被迷惑。这些被疯狂驱使的战士经常被驱使进入狂暴的状态，包括不可预测的暴力冲突；疯狂地对附近的目标挥舞武器，无法分辨敌我。
被月亮触及的人以各种方式发展他们的痛苦，例如经历野蛮的月球仪式或被精灵的力量所诅咒。被月蚀的人很少在大群体中出现，这可能是由于他们在战斗中具有传染性的野蛮本性。

subclassFeature.name: Lunar Delirium
entries: 在3级时，你在狂暴时唤起的剧烈的精神错乱会压倒其他影响你心灵的疯狂状况。在暴怒时，你会获得以下效果。

items: 你对精神伤害有抵抗力。
你对新的疯狂效应免疫，任何影响你的疯狂效应都被中止。
当你采取{@action Attack}行动并在用近战武器进行的攻击卷中取得关键命中时，你可以使用一个额外的行动对你范围内随机决定的生物进行近战武器攻击。你还会获得相当于你体质修正值的临时命中率（最低为1），持续到你的愤怒结束。

subclassFeature.name: Lesser Gravity
entries: 在6级时，当你不穿重甲时，你的速度会额外增加10英尺。
此外，当你进行跳高或立定跳远时，你能移动的距离会增加，其数量等于你的力量修正值。

subclassFeature.name: Waning Sanity
entries: 从10级开始，你那被迷惑的心理会变得有感染力，并扩散到你周围的其他生物。作为你进入愤怒状态的额外行动的一部分，你可以使你周围30英尺内自愿的生物获得你的月神谵妄特性的影响，这种影响持续到你的愤怒结束。
或者，你可以使用这个奖励动作，迫使你30英尺范围内的生物做一个智慧救赎动作，其DC等于8+你的熟练度加成+你的宪法修改器，否则就会受到短暂的精神错乱，持续到你的狂怒结束。你可以在目标进行攻击时对其使用你的反应，迫使它对其范围内的一个随机确定的生物重新进行攻击卷。

subclassFeature.name: Waxing Relentlessness
entries: 在14级时，当你的生命值下降到0，并在完成长时间休息后第一次使用你的无情狂暴功能时，你会自动下降到1生命值，而不需要做蓄力。在你为无情的愤怒所做的下一次蓄力动作中，DC将从10开始。
每当你受益于此功能或成功地完成你的无情怒火功能的救赎时，你也会获得与你的等级相等的临时命中率。

subclassFeature.name: Void Domain
entries: 虚空；物质之间空间的抽象，它同时存在于已知的多元宇宙之内和之外。居住在巨大黑暗中的生物或从这一虚无中产生的生物往往拥有巨大的力量，体现了超越万物的空虚的永恒包容的本质。虽然这些生物，如哈达或尤格-索托斯，往往不是现代解释中的神灵，但他们发现，他们从较小的生命那里得到的崇拜增加了他们的影响力，并授予那些提供信仰的人准神的魔法。

entries.caption: Void Domain Spells
rows: 1st
{@spell arms of hadar}, {@spell cause fear|xge}
3rd
{@spell darkness}, {@spell Nystul's magic aura}
5th
{@spell dispel magic}, {@spell pulse wave|egw}
7th
{@spell dimension door}, {@spell entropy|ASoS}
9th
{@spell planar binding}, {@spell telekinesis}

subclassFeature.name: Dark Certitude
entries: 在第1级时，你不能被魔法移出你的空间，除非你想这样做。你可以花1分钟与你身边10英尺内的一个你选择的生物分享这个效果，持续8小时。一旦你分享了这个效果，你就不能再这样做了，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Embrace of the Beyond
entries: 同样在1级，当一个生物在你或你60英尺范围内的同盟生物的5英尺范围内结束其回合时，你可以使用你的反应，迫使它对你的牧师法术救赎DC进行力量救赎。如果它失败了，它的速度就会变成0，直到它的下一个回合结束，因为十恶不赦的卷须抓住了它。
你可以使用这个功能的次数与你的智慧修饰值相等（最少一次）。当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会重新获得所有已消耗的使用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Null Space
entries: 从2级开始，你可以使用你的通道神性创造一个神奇的不可理解的领域。
作为一个行动，你展示你的神圣符号，一个异形能量球从你的空间中发出。这个球体的半径为40英尺，持续时间为1分钟。在这个范围内的生物如果试图施展法术，必须对你的牧师法术救赎DC进行智慧救赎，否则将失去该法术。
类特征，例如法术槽，不会因为失败的救赎而被消耗，但用于法术的行动、奖励行动或反应会丢失。你选择相当于你熟练度加成一半（四舍五入）的生物作为这个行动的一部分，对这个特性免疫。

subclassFeature.name: Malleable Positionality
entries: 在第6级时，你可以使用你的行动来锁定你身边60英尺内的两个生物，并立即将每个生物传送到对方所占据的空间。不愿意的生物必须对你的牧师法术救赎DC做一个智慧救赎来抵抗这个效果。如果一个目标成功地进行了这个蓄力，那么这个效果对两个生物都会失效。
一旦你使用了这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Potent Spellcasting
entries: 8级时，你在使用任何牧师咒语的伤害上加上你的智慧修正值。

subclassFeature.name: Voidbringer
entries: 在达到17级时，你的崇拜会赋予你一个虚空的伟大存在对凡人的终极恩惠。

items: 当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你可以选择力量伤害、坏死伤害或精神伤害。你获得对该伤害类型的抗性，直到你用这个特性选择一个不同的类型。
受你的 "超越的拥抱 "特征影响的生物，在智力和智慧方面对你的牧师特征和法术有劣势，因为你召唤的卷轴会分散他们的注意力并减缓他们的思维。

subclassFeature.name: Dustwalker
entries: 无论是通过长期漂浮在星海的细丝中，还是通过其他一些神秘的意外，很少有人能学会驾驭星尘的柔软而强大的本质。一些在这方面有技能的人选择磨练自己的能力，以达到欺骗和无赖的目的。通过挥舞星星的光和尘，尘行者既能利用他们周围的空间，又能分散敌人的注意力，使他们在面对任何努力时都能表现出色。

subclassFeature.name: Astral Steps
entries: 从3级开始，当你选择这个原型时，你学会了操纵星尘闪烁的魔法性质，以便以有利的方式转移你的位置。作为一个奖励动作，你可以创造一个无形的、幽灵般的星尘的微弱信标，持续时间长达1小时，只有你能携带或放置。作为这个奖励动作的一部分，或者作为信标消失前的后续奖励动作，你可以将信标放置在你周围5英尺内你选择的一个无人空间。
当你使用一个行动或奖励行动到（%0%）时，你能够从你的位置传送到作为该行动或奖励行动一部分的信标所处的空间，最多可以传送30英尺。如果当你试图传送时，信标的空间被占用，这个效果就会失败，什么都不会发生。一旦你传送到一个信标，它就会被耗尽并消失。
你可以创造与你的熟练度加成相等的信标数量，并在你完成长时间休息时恢复所有消耗的使用。

subclassFeature.name: Asterism
entries: 同样在3级时，你可以探测到附近星尘的存在。作为一个动作，你可以巧妙地将一撮星尘洒在你周围5英尺内你选择的生物或物体上，并在这个生物或物体上保持1小时。你可以感知这个生物或物体的距离和方向，只要他们在你500英尺范围内。

subclassFeature.name: Fade Away
entries: 9级时，你在用星际步法功能传送后立即变得（%0%），直到你的下一个回合结束。如果你攻击或施法，这种隐身状态会提前结束。

subclassFeature.name: Blinding Dust
entries: 从13级开始，你利用星尘的技能使你可以更有攻击性地使用它。你可以用一个动作使你创造的信标爆炸，使一阵星尘充满一个20英尺半径的区域。该区域内的每个生物都必须对DC等于8+你的熟练度加成+你的智力修改器的宪法救赎，否则就会被（%0%），最长1分钟。生物可以在每个回合结束时重新进行蓄力，如果成功则结束对自己的影响。

subclassFeature.name: Starforged
entries: 17级时，你已经开始完全掌握如何挥舞星尘来伤害和隐藏。你获得以下好处。

items: 你可以用你的星际步法功能从你的位置传送到120英尺。
你的淡出功能现在会使你变得（%0%），持续1分钟。如果你攻击或施法，隐身状态仍然会提前结束。

subclassFeature.name: Gravity Soul
entries: 重力灵魂巫师是那些可能来自居住在外部宇宙的生物的后代，或者在某种程度上被超越世界的力量改变了本质。这些施法者发展出一种与生俱来的天赋，可以让他们周围的世界随心所欲地弯曲。
挥舞着强大的魔法来影响重力，这些巫师擅长于操纵战场。他们控制敌人的位置，使他们变得脆弱，同时也保护自己和盟友不受伤害。

entries.name: Considering Spells for This Subclass
entries: DM可以决定将{@filter chronurgy and graviturgy wizards|spells|subclass=Wizard: Chronurgy;Wizard: Graviturgy}可用的主题法术添加到巫师法术列表中，供玩家选择。{@i Explorer's Guide to Wildemount: pg. 186}

subclassFeature.name: Warp Space
entries: 从1级开始，你可以使用一个额外的行动，在你60英尺范围内的地面上瞄准一个点，并强迫这个点30英尺范围内的每个生物对你的巫师法术救赎DC进行力量救赎，或者被拉向这个点10英尺。体型高于大型的生物在这个蓄力动作上有优势。在这个等级达到2级时，你可以在使用这个特性时花费1个巫术点，使未能通过这个救赎的生物坠落（%0%）。
你可以使用这个功能的次数等于你的魅力修改器（最少一次）。当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会重新获得所有已消耗的使用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Repulsion Field
entries: 在6级时，当你使用1级或更高等级的法术槽施法时，你可以使用这个特性，在施法前或施法后立即将你周围5英尺内的生物推到离你5英尺的直线上（由你选择）。你还可以以自己为中心创造一个5英尺半径的引力场，阻止普通的投射物进入，直到你下一个回合开始（巨人或攻城机投掷的巨石以及类似的投射物不受影响）。当你使用1级以上的法术槽施法时，使用此功能时，你推动生物的距离和阻挡投射物的领域半径都会增加5英尺，每1级以上的法术槽都是如此。
一旦你使用了这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Lightened Load
entries: 同样在6级，你能够被动地操纵你身上物体的密度。你的携带能力成为你的力量或魅力值（以较高者为准）乘以15。

subclassFeature.name: Aspect of Relativity
entries: 从14级开始，你操纵重力的能力允许你在短时间内将重力更强烈地束缚在你的形态上。作为一个动作，你可以进行一次转变，获得以下好处，持续1分钟。

items: 你获得与你的步行速度相等的飞行速度，并能悬停。
当你被近战或远程武器攻击击中时，你可以减少你所受的伤害，其数量相当于你的魅力修饰值（最小为1），因为你挥舞着你周围的重力以抵御攻击。
你可以选择用你的扭曲空间功能来影响哪些生物，并可以用扭曲空间功能将它们移向或移开你所选择的点，但要注意拯救失败。

entries: 一旦你使用了这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个长时间的休息，除非你花费6个巫术点数来再次使用它。

subclassFeature.name: Center of Gravity
entries: 在18级时，如果你还不知道，你获得了（%0%）的法术，可以在不消耗法术槽的情况下施放一次，并且可以选择在施放时免疫该法术的效果。这个法术不计入你已知的法术数量。
一旦你以这种方式施放（%0%），你就不能再这样做，直到你完成一个长时间的休息，尽管你仍然可以用一个可用的法术槽正常施放。

entries.name: Unending Breath
entries: 你对空间真空的天性使你可以无限期地屏住呼吸，而你却没有（%0%）。

entries.name: Meteoric Strike
entries: 当你用攻击或法术伤害一个生物时，你可以使攻击或法术对该生物造成额外伤害。额外伤害等于你等级的一半（四舍五入）。
一旦你使用这个特性，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期休息。
这些矮人最初是一系列被抛弃的部族，因为危险的无休止的好奇心而被他们的家园亲属拒绝，他们来到太空深处，寻找一个受欢迎的家。在富含矿物质的星体上找到无人认领的土地后，这些以前被遗弃的流浪者的后代在几个世纪后开始与他们以前的世界互动。他们交易魔法物品，并由寻求扩大其声誉和财富的魔族国王领导。

entries.name: Scintillating Stardust
entries: 从第三级开始，你可以用你的行动来释放你体内的神圣能量，使你的眼睛发出万花筒般的光芒，并在你周围的区域发出一层闪亮的星尘笼罩。
你的变身持续1分钟，或者直到你作为一个额外动作结束它。在你变身的瞬间，在你20英尺范围内能看到你的生物必须各自成功地进行智慧救赎（DC8+你的熟练度加成+你的魅力修饰），否则就会被你影响（%0%），直到你下一回合结束。当被这个特性迷住时，该生物的速度为0。
此外，在你的每个回合中，当你用攻击或法术对一个目标造成伤害时，你可以对其造成额外的辐射伤害。额外的辐射伤害等同于你的等级。
一旦你使用这个特性，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。
作为一个拥有宇宙血统的阿西玛人，你可以追溯到一个服务于统治命运或天体的神灵的天人。这些生命的后裔往往因其优雅的空灵之美和在旅行中迅速赢得新朋友的能力而受到关注。他们往往以讲述奇怪和令人震惊的故事而闻名，这些故事来自于他们的前辈在星空中的岁月。

entries.name: Stellar Sight
entries: 你在智力({@skill Investigation})、智慧({@skill Insight})和智慧({@skill Perception})的能力检定上有优势，你可以确定视觉幻觉的真实性质。

entries.name: Light Step
entries: 作为一个额外的行动，你可以从你的位置传送到一个你能看到的未被占用的空间，最多可以传送20英尺。
一旦你使用这个特性，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。
这些触及星辰的地精以前是隐居的小人物，现在他们的社区已经在全世界范围内越来越多地被发现了。他们在隐蔽的山顶村落中对太阳和星座的强烈崇拜，使这些地精与他们的低级居住者不同，赋予了他们广阔的思想和对发光技巧的亲和力；这两点在他们现在探索的新土地上证明是有用的。

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: 习惯于苍白的月光，你在黑暗和昏暗的条件下有卓越的视觉。你能在60英尺内的昏暗光线下看清东西，就像亮光一样，在黑暗中看清东西，就像暗光一样。你在黑暗中无法辨别颜色，只有灰色的阴影。

entries.name: Lightened Gravity
entries: 你的基本行走速度增加到35英尺。

entries.name: Memories of the Moon
entries: 你知道（%0%）的咒语。当你达到3级时，你可以用这个特性施放一次（%1%）的咒语，并在完成长时间休息后重新获得这个能力。当你达到5级时，你可以用这个特质施放一次{@spell moonbeam}的法术，并在完成长时间休息后重新获得这个能力。体质是你对这些法术的施法能力。
虽然许多精灵是由他们血统中的祖先精灵造成的，但也有一些精灵是由元素能量的涌动而生。虽然不常被认为是原始的元素形式，但月亮的岩石和光芒拥有巨大的力量，可以改变长期暴露在其中的生物的本质。
月亮精灵是相对罕见的生命，他们来自受到月亮神灵祝福的土地，以某种方式拥有大量来自月亮的陨石，或者以某种方式受到月亮精灵魔法的影响。在这些影响下产生的精灵，都拥有苍白或灰暗的头发和眼睛，与生俱来的魔法天赋，以及经常精心修剪或沉着的举止。

entries.name: Guiding Light
entries: 你知道{@spell dancing lights}的咒语。智慧是你对它的法术修饰。每当你施展{@spell dancing lights}并将四道光结合成一个模糊的人形时，你可以选择让这个人形指向真正的北方，为你提供方向性知识。

entries.name: Glimmerborn
entries: 从第3级开始，当你被你能看到的30英尺范围内的生物攻击时，你可以用你的反应在攻击卷上施加劣势，使光线在击中或未击中之前在攻击者周围闪现。不能（%0%）的攻击者对这个特性免疫。
一旦你使用这个特性，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。
星心半身人的性格与他们的光脚表亲最接近，他们倾向于憎恨充斥在他们周围世界的暴力，更喜欢在与朋友的一杯茶或一品脱啤酒中找到快乐。为了寻求答案，给那些需要帮助的人带来和平，这些善良的人甚至从最遥远的恒星资源中寻找灵感和指导。受到上天的眷顾，这些半身人在这片土地上行走，受到星星本身的保护。

entries.name: Legacy of Destiny
entries: 你知道（%0%）的咒语。当你达到3级时，你可以用这个特性施放一次（%1%）的咒语，并在完成长时间休息后重新获得这个能力。当你达到5级时，你可以用这个特质施放一次{@spell enhance ability}的法术，并在完成长时间休息后重新获得这个能力。魅力是你对这些法术的施法能力。

entries.name: Additional Language
entries: 你可以说、读、写天朝语。
这是一种天然的、有声望的魔鬼遗产，他们是在神秘的黄昏阴暗处或夜晚的预言性星座中出生的盗贼。通过某种命运的安排，宇宙力量的光辉本质与这些盗贼结合在一起，使他们有机会获得圆满的未来。
这些伪天体的影响改变了盗贼们通常从地狱中汲取的力量，使他们对引导自己和盟友走向有利的命运充满了兴趣。暮光之城的盗贼比他们其他的盗贼表亲更倾向于善良，这通常是由于他们固有的力量使他们更容易被周围的人接受。

entries.name: Certainty of Space
entries: 你对法术和其他违背你的意愿将你从你的空间中移出的魔法效果，在救赎上有优势。

entries.name: Whispering Dark
entries: 你可以对你周围30英尺内的任何生物进行心灵感应。只有当你们两个人有共同的语言时，该生物才能理解你。你每次可以用这种方式对一个生物进行心灵感应。
在一个古老的仪式中，这些精灵和他们的后代被居住在巨大黑暗中的实体触碰而改变，他们的身体和心灵都发生了不可挽回的变化。
许多其他精灵拒绝接受这些生命，认为它们是精灵血统的一个堕落分支，有奇怪的倾向和对权力的恶性欲望。虽然这些特征可能确实存在于一些虚空精灵身上，但其他人则试图利用赋予他们的黑暗力量来行善或进一步追求知识，也许是为了试图回到精灵的行列。这些生命可以通过他们差异很大的紫色皮肤、头发和眼睛，以及偶尔来自虚空的礼物--一两根小的残余触须--来识别。

entries.name: Age
entries: 星际人的成熟速度与人类相同，在20岁左右达到成年。然而，他们坚持的时间比人类要长得多，常常活到150岁以上。

entries.name: Alignment
entries: 星生文化很少导致邪恶人格的发展，更多的是培养良好或中性的性格。

entries.name: Size
entries: 星际人比人类略高、略轻，通常身高在6到7英尺之间，体重约150磅。你的体型是中等。

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: 作为拥有恒星视觉的生命，你的眼睛即使在最黑暗的夜晚也能看到。你可以在60英尺范围内看到昏暗的光线，就像亮光一样，而在黑暗中，就像昏暗的光线一样。你在黑暗中无法辨别颜色，只有灰色的阴影。

entries.name: Bodies of Stardust
entries: 当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你可以选择一种伤害类型，而不是重击、穿刺或砍击伤害。你获得对该伤害类型的抗性，直到你用该特性选择一个不同的类型。来自魔法武器的伤害无视这种抵抗。

entries.name: Starry Steps
entries: 你知道（%0%）的咒语。当你达到5级时，你可以用这个特质施放一次（%1%）的法术，当你完成一次长时间的休息时，可以重新获得施放的能力。体质是你对这些法术的施法能力。

entries.name: Languages
entries: 你可以说、读、写普通话和你选择的一种额外语言。

raceFluff.name: Starborn
entries: {@i "I'm going to be sick, Avaalor," sighed Merrit, cautiously stepping through the dark gate while waving away a strand of errant stardust from her shoulder. "I still can't handle the difference between each world when we go so quickly, no matter how much Elder Vau'lez says we should appreciate the variety. It's only been a few days since we visited Elysium, and this place doesn't exactly compare."}

{@i Her companion looked up in response, squinting as newly acrid and poisonous-smelling air stings his eyes. "I know, my starlight, I know." he mumbled, quietly. "It has been rather rough travel lately, hasn't it? I'm not sure why we've needed to move with such haste these last weeks,but I'm sure the elders have their reasons. Do you want me to speak to one of the portalkeepers for you?"}

{@i "Oh, no, don't bother them on my account. I'm only complaining," answered Merrit, her senses adjusting to a dark gray sky and menagerie of rancid oozes emanating from the ground. "I was just looking forward to finally selling off the jewels I found for that demigod in Arborea, not taking a jaunt into the Abyss to gaze at viper trees and vrocks."}
星际人是一个旅行和探索的民族，是在几代人接触宇宙和平面能量的过程中产生的。他们被认为是很久以前从星界的束缚中挣脱出来的人类、精灵和精灵囚犯的后代，这个社会现在是一个游牧民族的社区，他们在长期的旅行过程中寻求培养平衡与和平。

entries.name: Cosmically Imbued
entries: 星际人是一个有点身体强壮的民族，通常身高超过6英尺，但没有他们这种尺寸的生物所期望的那样密集。他们在很大程度上与人类相似，大部分时间都有精致的特征，尽管他们周围经常有星尘的气膜，在物质和大小上差别很大。
这些生命在数百年的时间里变得具有内在的魔力，这是因为他们暴露在星界和频繁的宇宙旅行中的结果。在成熟后期，星裔变得不那么有能力保持他们所体现的魔法能量，他们的头发变成了漂浮的苍白的细纱，他们的身体散发出更重的盘旋尘埃和幽灵般的星光的笼罩。

entries.name: Ever Seeking, Ever Lasting
entries: 星裔社会高度重视探索和确保他们祖先的遗产得到永恒的尊重。星裔社区的长老们教导说，他们的祖先以精神形式存活，以保护后代，但只要他们的子孙继续查看新的土地，遇到陌生的人，并收集新的观点。
这个古老信仰的核心是，星裔认为他们探索的距离越大，他们的旅行对他们的祖先就越有价值。为了尊重这种做法，这些人将他们的文化致力于游牧社会；一个专注于在各个世界和平面上不断变化的散居地。

entries.name: Traders and Travelers
entries: 作为经验丰富的游牧民族，经过几代人的磨练，星际人已经意识到，他们对星际旅行的嗜好为他们成为许多世界和人民的重要商人提供了可能性。尽管星裔贸易商队仍然保持着从新的土地和社会中收集不同经验的价值，但如果他们遇到了他们知道会得到丰厚报酬的物品，他们往往会找到回到他们曾经访问过的世界。

entries.name: We Are All Stardust
entries: 星际人被那些与他们交往的人誉为一个非常受欢迎的群体，似乎对整个星球上存在的各种观点和思想方式都持开放态度。星际人并不只是为了培养自己的商业习惯而渴望与他人相处，而是要在每个世界之间慢慢建立共同点；学习他人的生活方式，然后在他们的旅行中传播这种知识。这种做法是基于一种文化信条，声称在基本层面上，所有的人和生命都是由相同的永恒元素构成的，应该寻求相互理解。
在这种普遍共性的观点下，许多星际人倾向于抱有希望，认为人与人之间的分歧可以通过相互承认而得到解决。在多元宇宙中存在着不止一个关于旅行者短暂访问的寓言故事，他们解决了紧张或交战的土地之间的争端，但再也没有人见过。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 奇美拉的法术能力是魅力（法术保存（%0%），法术攻击命中率（%1%））。它可以先天性地施展以下不需要组件的法术。

trait.name: Starform
entries: 奇美拉对所有改变其形态、降低其速度或导致其{@condition paralyzed}或{@condition restrained}的法术和效果都有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 奇美拉有三种攻击方式：一种是咬人，一种是用角，还有一种是用爪子。当它的星煞之气可用时，它可以用星煞之气来代替它的咬或角。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} 命中率+10，范围5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})穿刺伤害加上5 ({@damage 1d10})力量伤害。

action.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} 命中率+10，范围5英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 1d12 + 6})重击伤害加上5 ({@damage 1d10})力量伤害。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} 命中率+10，范围5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})砍击伤害加上5 ({@damage 1d10})力量伤害。

action.name: Starfury Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: 龙头在15英尺的范围内呼出宇宙毁灭的气息。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 17}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到26({@damage 6d8})力量伤害和26({@damage 6d8})辐射伤害，蓄力成功会受到一半的伤害。

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: 遮阳板可以在窄至1英寸宽的空间内移动而不被挤压。

trait.name: Sunlight Weakness
entries: 当在阳光下时，阴暗者在攻击卷、能力检查和蓄力方面都处于劣势。

action.name: Entropic Touch
entries: {@atk mw}{@hit 4}(+你的智慧修改器)击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2})坏死性伤害。

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: 达斯科瓦的武器攻击是神奇的。当达斯科瓦用任何武器击中时，该武器会造成额外的18（（%0%））辐射伤害（包括在攻击中）。

trait.name: Falling Sun
entries: 在达斯科瓦10英尺范围内开始他们的回合的生物必须做一个{@dc 17}宪法救赎动作，否则在他们下一个回合开始前无法恢复命中率。如果一个生物以这种方式被阻止从一个法术中恢复命中率，达斯科瓦会恢复与被阻止的治疗量相等的命中率。

trait.name: Fatalism
entries: 每当黄昏之神将一个目标降低到0点生命值时，该目标在死亡救赎中处于劣势，直到其死亡或恢复知觉。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 昏迷者对法术和其他魔法效果的救赎有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 如果可以的话，黄昏娃会使用 "不可避免的黄昏"。然后它用黄昏之刃进行三次攻击。

action.name: Duskblade
entries: {@atk mw}命中率+11，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6})砍击伤害加上18 ({@damage 4d8})辐射伤害。

action.name: Inevitable Dusk {@recharge}
entries: 昏迷者在昏迷者的20英尺范围内召唤昏暗的阴霾。在这个范围内的其他生物必须做一个{@dc 17}的体质测试，否则会变成{@condition blinded}，持续1分钟。一个生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对它的影响。

action.name: Shadow Step
entries: The duskova magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 90 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see in an area of dim light or darkness.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The emerossi is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). The emerossi has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Rising Sun
entries: The emerossi regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in an area of magical darkness.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The emerossi has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The emerossi uses Inevitable Dawn if it can. It then makes two attacks with its Dawn Stave.

action.name: Dawn Stave
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Inevitable Dawn {@recharge 5}
entries: The emerossi summons the light of dawn in 20-foot radius of the emerossi. Other creatures in this area must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) radiant damage and become {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. A creature that succeeds on this save takes half damage and is not {@condition blinded}.

action.name: Light Step
entries: The emerossi magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the grub has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Voidburrow
entries: When the entropulum damages a creature with an attack, it can immediately bore into a harmless adjacent demiplane until the start of its next turn. It then reemerges in an unoccupied location of its choice within 10 feet of the space it burrowed from. This ability can not be used while the entropulum is within an area of bright light.

action.name: Void Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the broodlord has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Voidburrow
entries: When the entropulum damages a creature with an attack, it can immediately bore into a harmless adjacent demiplane until the start of its next turn. It then reemerges in an unoccupied location of its choice within 20 feet of the space it burrowed from. This ability can not be used while the entropulum is within an area of bright light.

action.name: Void Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Broodcall {@recharge 5}
entries: Roll initiative for 2 ({@dice 1d4}) entropulum grubs with full health that are summoned into unoccupied spaces adjacent to the broodlord. The broodlord then slips into its demiplane until the start of its next turn, upon which time it reemerges into an unoccupied space of its choice within 20 feet of the space it vanished from. Once the broodlord returns, the grubs disappear.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Watchful Gatekeeper
entries: The giant has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two attacks with its stellar fist.

action.name: Stellar Fist
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 6d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} +13 to hit, reach 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}34 ({@damage 4d12 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Liminal Space (1/Day)
entries: The giant taps into twilight, forcing creatures to face the duality of themselves. Creatures in a 30-foot radius centered on a point of the giant's choice within 60 feet of it must make a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw or be banished to a demiplane of the same size of this effect's radius for up to 1 minute or until the giant loses concentration (as if concentrating on a spell). While in this demiplane, the creature is confronted by a facade of itself that is hostile to the creature and its allies. This facade rolls initiative, is randomly placed in the demiplane, and has all abilities, features, effects, traits, and nonmagical items as the creature does when they enter the demiplane. The facade has a maximum number of hit points equal to the number of hit dice the creature possesses and fades upon dropping to 0 hit points. If the facade fades, the creature is released from the demiplane and reappears in the space it was in before being banished. If this space is occupied, the creature is instead teleported to the nearest unoccupied space.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If K'va fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Bound to the Beyond
entries: If a creature within 60 ft. of K'va takes damage from K'va, it becomes magically bound to its space, unable to physically move or be moved from its location. If a creature is moved from its space by magic, such as a creature using misty step or dimension door, or by K'va's Detach Positionality, this effect ends for that creature. A creature can make a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect upon itself on a success.

trait.name: Distortive Intensity
entries: Whenever a creature hostile to K'va ends its turn in a 20 ft. radius of K'va, the crushing psyche emanating from K'va prevents the creature from taking reactions. An affected creature in this area must also chose to use either an action or a bonus action on its turns, not both. This effect lasts for a creature until they are no longer within the 20 ft. radius surrounding K'va.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: K'va makes three attacks with its psychic entropy.

action.name: Psychic Entropy
entries: {@atk rs} +14 to hit, reach 120 ft., one creature. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Call of the Void
entries: K'va targets one creature within 120 ft. The target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way the creature regards K'va as its master and ally and will obey any commands K'va gives it. The {@condition charmed} target can repeat the saving throw whenever it takes damage or if K'va gives it a suicidal order, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to Call of the Void for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Detach Positionality {@recharge 5}
entries: K'va forces each creature of its choice within 60 ft. of it to make a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or be instantly teleported to an unoccupied location on the ground of K'va's choice within 60 ft. of K'va. The creatures then take 54 ({@damage 12d8}) force damage. A creature that succeeds the saving throw is not teleported and takes half as much damage.

legendary.name: Psychic Entropy
entries: K'va uses Psychic Entropy.

legendary.name: Warp
entries: K'va teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied location it can see.

legendary.name: Dark Well. (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: K'va emits a pulse of dark psychic and gravitational energy. Each creature of its choice in a 20-foot radius must make a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

trait.name: Light Form
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 30 ft. of the elemental and the two of them can see each other, the elemental can force the creature to make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the effect ends.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the elemental until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If it looks at the elemental in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dream Dust
entries: When a creature starts its turn within 5 feet of the moth, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or it becomes drowsy and its speed is reduced by 10 feet for 1 minute or until it uses an action to rouse itself. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, it is also {@condition unconscious} until it takes damage or until someone uses an action to wake them, ending the effect on the creature.

action.name: Dream Eater
entries: {@atk mw} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage. If the target is an {@condition unconscious} creature, it takes an additional 2 ({@damage 1d4}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Dream Dust
entries: When a creature starts its turn within 5 feet of the moth, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or it becomes drowsy and its speed is reduced by 10 feet for 1 minute or until it uses an action to rouse itself. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, it is also {@condition unconscious} until it takes damage or until someone uses an action to wake them, ending the effect on the creature.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Dream Eater (swarm has more than half HP)
entries: {@atk mw} +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is an {@condition unconscious} creature, it takes an additional 2 ({@damage 1d4}) psychic damage.

action.name: Dream Eater (swarm has less than half HP)
entries: {@atk mw} +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is an {@condition unconscious} creature, it takes an additional 2 ({@damage 1d4}) psychic damage.

monster.name: Moonrock Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Lunar Light
entries: The golem emits pale luminosity, shedding dim light in a 30-foot radius. Creatures hostile to the golem that start their turn in this light must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition charmed} by the golem. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature has a speed of 0. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to Lunar Light for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The nevasi's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells requiring no components:

trait.name: Delirious Plague
entries: When the nevasi spends at least 1 minute closely interacting with another creature outside of combat, it can it can force the creature to make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the nevasi. Creatures {@condition charmed} in this way treat the nevasi as a trusted ally and follow its commands as best as they can. Affected creatures can also use this trait on further creatures that they interact with once every 24 hours, charming them for the nevasi.

If the target is given a suicidal command from the nevasi or whenever it takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. Creatures that succeed are no longer {@condition charmed}, are not aware of having been so, and become immune to this effect for 30 days. The nevasi knows if a creature succeeds the saving throw or whenever a thrall has broken free (such as being affected by greater restoration).

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The nevasi has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nevasi makes two attacks with its maddening scratch.

action.name: Maddening Scratch
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage and the target must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target rolls a {@dice d100} to be afflicted with a {@table short-term madness|DMG} effect until the end of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Summon Void
entries: After the null spirit deals damage to a creature with an attack, a 10-foot radius sphere of magical darkness centered on the target's space is summoned until the start of the null spirit's next turn. The null spirit sees through this magical darkness. This can only occur once on each of the Null Spirit's turns.

trait.name: Starsnuffing
entries: If a hostile creature within 60 feet of the null spirit ends its turn in magical darkness, it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage. The null spirit regains hit points equal to the amount of damage dealt.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The null spirit makes two attacks with its Entropic Strike.

action.name: Entropic Strike
entries: {@atk mw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) cold damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Astral Imprisonment
entries: The outaerax can use a bonus action to target a creature that it has damaged with its meteoric morningstar or cosmic collapse this turn. The target must make a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or be banished to a demiplane, as if the target was affected by {@spell banishment}, until the start of the outaerax's next turn.

trait.name: Vacuous Breath
entries: The outaerax does not need to breathe.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The outaerax has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The outaerax makes two attacks with its meteoric morningstar.

action.name: Meteoric Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage.

action.name: Cosmic Collapse
entries: The outaerax twists gravity in a 20-foot radius sphere surrounding it. Each other creature in this area must make a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage and be pulled up to 10 feet toward the outaerax or pushed up to 10 feet from the outaerax (the outaerax's choice). A creature that succeeds on the saving throw takes half as much damage and is not pulled or pushed.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Cosmic Trot
entries: As a bonus action, the satyr can teleport up to 20 feet from its position into an unoccupied space that it can see. The satyr leaves behind a pool of residual cosmic energy in the space it vanished from that lasts for 1 minute. The satyr can choose to teleport to one of these areas instead, when using this trait, up to a distance of 120 feet.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Constellatory Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) radiant damage.

action.name: Constellatory Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The star charger has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The star charger's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Constellation Incarnate
entries: The star charger regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in an area of magical darkness.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The charger makes three attacks: one with its hooves and two with its cosmic halberd.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Cosmic Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Celestial Stampede {@recharge 5}
entries: The star charger creatures a nebula of radiant force surrounding it and gains a flying speed of 120 ft. until the end of its next turn. It then moves up to 120 ft. in a straight line. Each creature in a 20-foot radius of the star charger while it moves must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) bludgeoning damage and 27 ({@damage 6d8}) radiant damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. A creature which succeeds on the saving throw takes half as much damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The starshard can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a {@creature cat} (40 ft., climb 30 ft.), an {@creature owl} (10 ft., fly 60 ft.), or a {@creature badger} (20 ft., burrow 10 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Any equipment it is carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Lesser Illumination
entries: The starshard sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The starshard has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Variant: Familiar
entries: The starshard can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a telepathic bond with its willing master. While the two are bonded, the master can sense what the starshard senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the starshard is within 10 feet of its master, the master shares the starshard's Magic Resistance trait. At any time and for any reason, the starshard can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

action.name: Glimmer (Bite in Beast Form)
entries: {@atk mw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against it before the start the starshard's next turn has advantage.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The starshard magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the starshard wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it. The starshard's lesser illumination trait is inactive while it is {@condition invisible}.

trait.name: Light Weaver
entries: The spider's webs are nearly {@condition invisible}, requiring a {@dc 15} Intelligence (Investigation) check to notice them. Web-filled areas are considered difficult terrain. Each 10-foot cube of webs has AC 10, 15 hit points, resistance to radiant damage, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to bludgeoning, piercing, and psychic damage.

When a creature other than the spider enters a webbed area or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage and become {@condition restrained} by the webs. A {@condition restrained} creature can use an action to make a {@dc 15} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check, escaping the webs on a success.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spider can use its Glimmereyes and makes two attacks with its Bright Bite.

action.name: Bright Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Glimmereyes
entries: The spider targets one creature that it can see within 30 feet. If the target can see the spider, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition charmed} by the spider. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature has disadvantage on ability checks to escape the spider's webbing. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Raveling Radiance (1/Day)
entries: The spider emits all of its harvested starlight in a 30-foot cone. The entire area becomes webbed and each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Twilight Rise
entries: When the phoenix falls to 0 hit points, it immediately regains a number of hit points equal to half its maximum hit points. The phoenix can only benefit from this trait once every 24 hours.

trait.name: Fiery Fall
entries: When the phoenix falls to 0 hit points, it explodes. Each creature within 10-feet of it must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't worn or carried.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The phoenix makes two attacks with its torrid talons.

action.name: Torrid Talons
entries: {@atk mw} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Twilight Rise
entries: When the phoenix falls to 0 hit points, it immediately regains a number of hit points equal to half its maximum hit points. The phoenix can only benefit from this trait once every 24 hours.

trait.name: Fiery Fall
entries: When the phoenix falls to 0 hit points, it explodes. Each creature within 30-feet of it must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't worn or carried.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The phoenix doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Feeble Illumination
entries: The phoenix sheds dim light in a 30-foot radius.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The phoenix makes two attacks with its torrid talons.

action.name: Torrid Talons
entries: {@atk mw} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Sunfallen Screech (1/Day)
entries: The phoenix releases an accursed screech in the area, forcing each creature in a 20-foot area around it to make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage and be unable to regain hit points for up to 1 minute. A creature that succeeds the saving throw takes half damage and can regain hit points. A creature can remake the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The scion sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

trait.name: Solar Flare
entries: Whenever the scion damages a creature with fire damage, it takes an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage (included in the attacks and flame wake) and must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn on a failed save.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scion makes three attacks: two with its sear and one with its plasma whip.

action.name: Sear
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) fire damage and 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Plasma Whip
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) fire damage and 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}) if the scion is not already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends the target is {@condition restrained}, moves with the scion, and takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage at the start of its turns.

action.name: Flame Wake {@recharge 5}
entries: The scion erupts with burning flame, forcing each creature within 10 feet of the space it travels through until the end of its turn to make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 42 ({@damage 12d6}) fire damage and 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The void caller is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The void caller has the following astromancer spells prepared:

trait.name: Dark Expansion (2/Day)
entries: When the void caller casts a spell using a spell slot of 4th level or lower, it can use this trait to gain the benefits of having cast the spell using one level higher of a spell slot.

trait.name: Empty Space
entries: When the void caller casts a spell using its action or bonus action, it can instantly teleport up to 10 feet away from its position into a currently unoccupied space that it can see.

trait.name: Tenebrous Soul
entries: If the void caller has one of their shades from beyond summoned, they can expend it as a bonus action. The void caller, along with anything they are wearing or carrying, instantly becomes {@condition invisible} and until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Response from Beyond (1/Day)
entries: The void caller can summon two {@creature shade from beyond|ASoS|shades from beyond}, which remain in the void caller's service for up to 10 minutes or until the void caller becomes {@condition incapacitated}. The void caller must give the shades from beyond commands as a bonus action in order to have them move or attack.

trait.name: Collapsing Void
entries: When the herald dies, a black hole appears in the space that it occupied, turning a 30-foot radius around it into difficult terrain. A creature that enters the area for the first time or starts their turn there must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or get knocked {@condition prone}, take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage, and be dragged 5 feet closer to the black hole.

A creature that succeeds on the save takes half damage and does not fall {@condition prone} or get dragged. A creature that enters the space the black hole occupies must make an additional {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) force damage, or half as much damage on a successful roll. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is disintegrated. A disintegrated creature and everything it is wearing and carrying, except magic items, are reduced to a pile of fine gray dust. The black hole exists for 1 minute, at which point it dissipates.

trait.name: Summon Void
entries: At the end of each of its turns, the void herald summons a 20-foot radius sphere of magical darkness centered on a target that it has damaged this turn, which lasts until the start of the void herald's next turn. The void herald sees through this darkness.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The void herald makes three attacks.

action.name: Oblivion Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage.

reaction.name: Whispering Dark
entries: When a creature the void herald can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the herald, the void herald can inflict it with overwhelming fear. The creature  must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Enchanting Aurora
entries: As the vulora moves, it leaves behind a 10-foot tall and 5-foot wide curtain of light in the spaces it moves through which lasts until the start of its next turn. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the vulora. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns or when it takes damage, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The vulora has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vulora makes two attacks with its frigid nip.

action.name: Frigid Nip
entries: {@atk mw} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be unable to take reactions until the start of the vulora's next turn, as well as choose to use either a bonus action or action on its next turn, not both.

action.name: Auroral Flash (Recharges after a Short or Long rest)
entries: The curtain of light from the vulora's Enchanting Aurora trait flashes with intense celestial energy. Each hostile creature within 20 feet of the curtain must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) radiant damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The hydra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the hydra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the hydra takes 25 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hydra dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The hydra regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Rift Strike
entries: The hydra can use a bonus action to open a brief portal and teleport one of its heads to an unoccupied space that it can see within 60 ft. of its body until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Unending Breath
entries: The hydra can hold its breath indefinitely as long as it is not {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hydra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Varifore Beam {@recharge}
entries: The hyrda channels the raw energy surrounding its heads, blasting it forward in an 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in this area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 ({@damage 8d10}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. For each head the hydra has beyond one, it makes an extra beam, originating from the head's location and in the direction of its choice. A creature can not be harmed by more than one beam on the same turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Xer'ka fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Voidfallen
entries: Xer'ka seeps the perverse and terrifying energy of the void in the area around it. A creature within the 60-foot radius surrounding Xer'ka that damages Xer'ka must make a {@dc 23} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of Xer'ka until the start of their next turn. A creature that succeeds this saving throw is immune to this effect until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Incarnate of Uncreation
entries: A creature {@condition frightened} of Xer'ka has its vitality siphoned as it returns to the great nothingness, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage at the end of each of its turns. Xer'ka regains hit points equal to the damage done by this effect.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Xer'ka makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +18 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Entropic Breath. {@recharge 5}
entries: Xer'ka unravels creation in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 77 ({@damage 22d6}) force damage and gains 1 level of {@condition exhaustion} at the start of each of its turns. A creature that succeeds the saving throw takes half damage and is not exhausted. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, removing 1 level of {@condition exhaustion} gained from this effect and no longer gaining {@condition exhaustion} from this effect on a success.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: Xer'ka makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Minor Warp
entries: Xer'ka teleports up to 20 feet from its location to an unoccupied space that it can see.

legendary.name: Collapse Creation. (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Xer'ka destoys reality in a 20-foot radius around it. A creature in this area other than Xer'ka must make a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. All nonmagical objects in this area are disintegrated.

monsterFluff.name: Cosmicborn Chimera
entries: An avatar of unbridled fury and ego, this monstrosity stalks the highest peaks and skies of the night. Jealous of the Demogorgon's original and gruesome design for chimeras, other princes of the Abyss sought to band together in a rare period of partnership to surpass the Prince of Demons' prototype. Taking advantage of a grand moment of stellar alignment, these entities corrupted cosmic energy, perverting chimeras to be greater and more terrible than ever before.

entries.name: Distorted Grace
entries: These creations no longer possess the natural grandeur belonging to the beings and forces from which they originate. An overwhelming ego from the dragon's head compels the chimera to gather hoards and command the subservience of lesser beings, while the lion and goat heads drive this abomination to challenge any creatures which dare enter the territories to which it lays claim. Infused and empowered by universal energy, these traits are only accentuated; providing the chimera with incredible confidence and strength.

entries.name: Champions of Evil
entries: Contrary to their relatively tame ancestors, these beings have transcended the tendency to be subjugated by mortal hands. Those who attempt to do so have a propensity to end up punctured, torn, and disintegrated in equal measure before the chimera's heavenly, yet terrifying visage.

monsterFluff.name: Duskova
entries: Twilight, the inevitable transition which brings the night and represents the finality of cosmic order, is often met with trepidation and fear. Duskova are the angelic beings which seek to preserve this sliver of the universal design, often believed to help deities ensure the cyclical coming of the moon, stars, and natural end of mortal life.

entries.name: Angels of Death
entries: These celestial beings are less bound to ideals of good than many angels, instead seeking to maintain cosmic law with divine conviction. They condemn those who attempt to abrogate the plans of predestination and escape their unavoidable end through means of lichdom or otherwise. In the eyes of the duskova, death is not an end to escape, but rather a natural transition that all mortal beings must endure.

entries.name: Ushers of Dark and Destiny
entries: Though known to serve gods that rule over the night sky, duskova will more often hold positions under deities of fate and death. While their angelic parallels, the {@creature emerossi|ASoS}, are agents of the dawn and wield the rising light of day, duskova take advantage of twilight gloom and rapidly sundering strikes to harm those that would dare challenge order.

monsterFluff.name: Emerossi
entries: Emerossi are the angelic keepers of the dawnward horizon. These celestial beings are thought to ensure that the sun will rise each morning, adhering to the eternal and inevitable cycles of twilight and fate.

entries.name: Ushers of Dawn and Fate
entries: These beings often serve as retainers for deities which rule over the sun, but are also faithful towards gods of destiny, knowing that their everlasting duty to the rising of dawn is a reflection of predestination and cosmic order. Even among other celestial beings, the emerossi are known as eternally and intensely committed to their heavenly cause. Any attempts to disturb the cycle of destiny are met with ferocious retaliation.

entries.name: Lightbound
entries: As opposed to their angelic relatives, the {@creature duskova|ASoS}, that unerringly ensure the coming of death and dusk, these beings wield fire and light to fulfill their commitment toward keeping the plans of providence intact. When sent to battle upon material worlds or defending their native Upper Planes from the influence of evil, they are known to act in tandem with both solars and planetars, commanding powerful divine magic to protect their allies and strike down foes.

monsterFluff.name: Entropulum
entries: Entropulum are an incessant infestation which plagues the cosmos. These entities, ocassionally known as void worms, fester indiscriminately across the worlds; invariably causing destruction with their voracious appetites for matter.

entries.name: The Creeping Beyond
entries: While not devastating the Material Plane, entropulum burrow into dimensional pockets located between their space in reality and the void of nonexistence. Within these dens of chaos, the void worms seem to breed. They spawn unending swarms of their kind that are all compelled by the sole desire which they possess; to consume any and all creation that they can.

monsterFluff.name: Horizon Giant
entries: Few giants are chosen by their gods to ascend their mortal forms to that of the greatest of giantkin. These beings are transformed by devoutly following the strict rules of the Ordning and committing grand acts of maat to earn honor and recognition for themselves and the giant pantheon.

entries.name: Guards of the Gods
entries: Horizon giants can come from any of the giantkin races, though it is far more common for them to ascend from {@creature storm giant|MM|storm} or {@creature cloud giant|MM|cloud giants}, who have a greater penchant for a positive disposition their their {@creature ice giant|MM|ice}, {@creature fire giant|MM|fire}, or other giant cousins. Those who are selected to become horizon giants become unmoored from the material plane they originate from and are charged with guarding the realms of their deities. These entities are gatekeepers, ensuring that any mortals or souls that attempt to contact their patrons are powerful and worthy enough to bring them worthwhile honor.

entries.name: Balanced Perspective
entries: Just as their giant cousins embody some element of their namesakes, horizon giants draw from the cosmic facet of twilight, the liminal transition between dusk and dawn. From this space between day, night, sky, and earth, these giants are predisposed to have a good-aligned, yet balanced personality and point of view.

monsterFluff.name: K'va, The Void Binder
entries: Nothingness. Oblivion. Nonbeing. Void. These are the primal forces that K'va, the Void Binder epitomizes. An entity that champions the dark and corruptive power of unreality, it travels to the farthest corners of creation to enforce its indomitable and undecipherable will upon existence.

entries.name: Astronomical Terror
entries: This creature is a nightmare of cosmic scale, one that annihilates mortality and matter alike in its eternal vision to return all things to the great dark beyond. K'va is the final harbinger for one of the ancient and powerful entities of the void, heralding their coming with demonstrations of terror. While other creatures native to the void will often infest the universe alone or in in brief alliances, all of these beings that inhabit a world will rally beneath K'va's command when it arrives.

entries.name: Living Void
entries: K'va does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.

monsterFluff.name: Light Elemental
entries: Light elementals are rare in comparison to the forms of elemental life that come from the Inner Planes. The natural energy which constitutes these beings stems from the pale starlight which shines upon a material world. Over time, the ambient power from the constellations coalesces into physical forms with limited will and intelligence.

entries.name: Illuminated Fate
entries: Upon their eventual sense of being, light elementals make a choice that will eternally decide their destinies. Some of these entities choose to take flight and move among the cosmos, forever traveling back toward the stars that gave them life. Other light elementals seek to stay and wander the world on which they were birthed. Whichever choice is made, all of these elementals are driven by a compulsive desire to purge any aberrant beings or magical darkness, wherever they might find them.

monsterFluff.name: Lunar Moth
entries: Fluttering about moonlit evenings, these pale insects are sometimes found in deep woods feeding upon the ambient energy given off by dreams of magical beasts. While trekking about in older forests, one should take care that they do not camp near or disturb a nest of these entities.

entries.name: Beneficial Bugs
entries: The origins of these dangerously adorable creatures are mysterious, but studies into their past have suggested that they were first created and kept by eladrin archmages in order to ward off poor memories while they rested. Now that they have flourished in the wilds, they have myriad uses and can even be seen as ridden by sprites into their tiny battles.

monsterFluff.name: Moonrock Golem
entries: Wrought and chiseled from rare lunar rock, these golems are seemingly bulky, but surprisingly lightweight creations. When an elemental spirit is bound to these forms, they take on unique properties and emit a soft radiance in a small area around them.

Only the most eccentric and influential mages are capable of creating these beings. The moon rocks they are fashioned from are exceedingly uncommon and must either be harvested from dangerous trips to their lunar source or collected from the exceptionally rare traders that travel between worlds. This material is valued for its paradoxical low weight and high durability, as well as its ease to enchant compared to the more difficult substances to turn in to golems, such as clay and stone.

monsterFluff.name: Nevasi
entries: Among the terrible abominations that the depths of void and unreality have spawned, the nevasi are the most horrifyingly adept at bringing about societal destruction. While the great and terrible aboleths may be capable of conversing with and controlling mortal minds, even they do not possess the dark and refined skills of subterfuge and manipulation that the nevasi have mastered.

entries.name: Mockery of Mortality
entries: Most aberrant beings hold little resemblance to living creation. Nevasi, however, are notable in the relatively humanoid form they hold, save for certain monstrous differences. While disguised as a mortal, these creatures love to take advantage of mortal desires, emulating beautiful men and women in an attempt to get closer to other beings. In their true forms, however, nevasi possess ghostly pale violet skin, vicious claws, and horns upon a seemingly partial and bisected head.

entries.name: Harbinger of Madness
entries: After a nevasi has obtained a position within a mortal society, they revel in their ability to bring about its doom. They infect mortal creatures with a virulent mental plague that turns beings into their thralls in order to sow betrayal and paranoia within their domains.

monsterFluff.name: Null Spirit
entries: Originating from the deep and everlasting chill of space, these restless apparitions seek to devour the energy of all creatures they cross. While generally content to wander throughout the great dark, these beings do occasionally find their way to a world full of heat and life that they may feed on for ages to come. As a universal embodiment of void and hunger, null spirits are innately magical, often instinctually using their prowess to terrify and trap their prey.

entries.name: Arms of the Old Ones
entries: Eldritch entities native to the nothing beyond all worlds will sometimes impose their indecipherable will upon these spirits, commanding them to commit bizarre, yet generally cruel deeds in their name. These acts often draw them to mortals who find their fates cut short or minds broken to madness in the face of these harbingers of entropy.

entries.name: Aberrant Renewal
entries: On the rare occasion that a null spirit is slain during its tasks or while feasting upon mortality, they will slowly be reborn from the energy they had siphoned throughout their existence.
